title: Drawing, "Sheep Resting", 1878
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolor on paper
markings: Marks: "Damask Linene" and hand holding a rose
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite? with color notations.
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a group of resting sheep, partially filled in with colors, and a detail of a sheep's hind leg and tail.  Color notations.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sheep Resting", 1878.
1878. Graphite, brush and watercolor on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-56.
